item.description:
Hello All,

****Location change***** - just right down the street from original location. We will meet at the library down the street in the childrens area of the library. Same time - 7 PM. If you have any questions please call me at 860-712-2256

My name is Suzanne Biscotti and I have volunteered to be the organizer for this Meetup Group because I want to play the Cashflow game and meet some interesting people. I have read many of Kiyosaki's books and am sure that a lot of you have as well since you joined this group. If you own a Cashflow game please let me know since as of now I do not have one for this meetup group. Of course I will find a way to bring the game to our meetup if no one has one

Now, let me tell you what I have planned for our first meetup:

- Introductions
- Snacks
- Gametime

What you will get out of attending this meetup session - A start to getting out of the RAT RACE!!! During the game we will be discussing all of the strategies being used and how to apply these to everday life to help us move from working for money to pay bills to have our money work for us. Hope to see you all there and please feel free to contact me at anytime.



Suzanne Biscotti
860-712-2256
item.name: Cashflow Game Time!
